scripts.start: pm2 flush && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && pm2 logs eos
scripts.stop: pm2 stop ecosystem.config.js && pm2 delete ecosystem.config.js
scripts.release:git: github-release release --user uniibu --repo eos --tag v1.1.8 --name "v1.1.8" --description "eos wallet release"
scripts.release:upload: github-release upload --user uniibu  --repo eos --tag v1.1.8 --name "bitsler_eos.sh" --file bitsler_eos.sh
scripts.build:release: docker build -t unibtc/eos:latest -t unibtc/eos:1.1.8 . && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && yarn release:now && docker push unibtc/eos:latest && docker push unibtc/eos:1.1.8
